channel.title: File permissions?
channel.description:
Alright I have set up apache mysql and php. I have a upload script but it is not working and I believe it is because of the file permissions. I have googled it and so far with no luck because I am hosting it from my own computer and not a webhoster. I decided to try to connect using a ftp server to my own computer. After I enter everything it says "connection established, waiting for welcome message..." After that it does not do anything.
So, I was wondering if anyone could help me with my problem. I dont really want to have to upload everything to some free webhoster but if I cannot find a solution to this I guess I will have to.

item.title: File permissions?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Eh can’t be bothered posting 100 times, back and forth.

AIM, MSN?

Add me with details in my profile if you do, and I will try :rolleyes:

some free script i downloaded

but that is besides the points… my main problem is being able to set file permissions.
